name: Introma
description:
When you wake up in your company's office, all your colleagues are gone. The office seems to have been deserted a short time ago. In fact, time itself doesn't seem to make any sense in this place. The only thing present to keep you company is an entity that speaks to you by e-mail. Who are you ? Where are you ? What have you done to find yourself here ? Who is this entity ? Browse the loops to find out !

Controls : 

Z : Forward

S : Back up

D : Go right

Q : Go left

F : Interact

Ctrl / C : Crouch

Shift : Sprint

Credits :  Game Programming :

Chloé MATHIAS

Ema OUARDI

Game Art :

Yann GIGEZ

Ema OUARDI

Game Design :

Eliass GODSON

Created during the Secret Santa Jam 2022 of LéoIndieGames

As a gift to :

Raphael, Adriana, Manon and Virgile.
